analyzed: punar ukta vat ābhāsam cheka anuprāsaḥ eva ca
anuprāsaḥ tridhā lāṭa anuprāsaḥ rūpakam catuḥ
upamā dīpakam ca eva prativastūpamā tathā
iti ete eva alaṅkārāḥ vācām kaiścid udāhṛtāḥ
punar ukta ābhāsam abhinna vastu iva udbhāsi bhinna rūpa padam
cheka anuprāsaḥ tu dvayoḥ dvayoḥ su sadṛśa ukti kṛtau
śa ṣābhyām repha saṃyoga eṣṭa vargeṇa ca yojitā

original: paraṣā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt hlahvahyādyaiśca saṃyutā // UKss_1.4 //
analyzed: paraṣā nāma vṛttiḥ syāt hlahva hi ādyaiḥ ca saṃyutā
sa rūpa saṃyoga yutām mūrdhni varga antya yogibhiḥ

original: sparśairyutāṃ ca manyante upanāgarikāṃ budhāḥ // UKss_1.5 //
analyzed: sparśaiḥ yutām ca manyante upanāgarikām budhāḥ
śeṣaiḥ vaṇaiḥ yathāyogam kathitām komalā ākhyayā
grāmyam vṛrtti praśaṃsanti kāvyeṣu ādṛta buddhayaḥ
sarūpa vyañjana nyāsam tisṛṣu etāsu vṛttiṣu
pṛthak pṛthak anuprāsam uśanti kavayaḥ sadā
sva rūpa artha aviśeṣe pi punaruktiḥ phala antarāt

original: śabdānāṃ vā padānāṃ vā lāṭānuprāsa iṣyate // UKss_1.8 //
analyzed: śabdānām vā padānām vā lāṭa anuprāsaḥ iṣyate
sa pada dvitaya sthityā dvayoḥ ekasya pūrvavat
tad anyasya svatantra tvāt dvayoḥ vā eka pada āśrayāt
svatantra pada rūpeṇa dvayoḥ vā api prayogataḥ
bhidyate na ekadhā bhedaiḥ pāda abhyāsa krameṇa ca
śrutyā saṃbandha virahāt yat padena pada antaram

original: guṇavṛtti pradhānena yujyate rūpakaṃ tu tat // UKss_1.11 //
analyzed: guṇa vṛtti pradhānena yujyate rūpakam tu tat

original: bandhastasya yataḥ śrutyā śrutyarthābhyāṃ ca tena tat /
analyzed: bandhaḥ tasya yatas śrutyā śruti arthābhyām ca tena tat
samasta vastu viṣayam eka deśa vivarti ca
samasta vastu viṣayam mālā rūpakam ucyate
yat vā eka deśa vṛtti syāt para rūpeṇa rūpaṇāt
ādi madhya anta viṣayāḥ prādhānya itara yoginaḥ
antargata upamā dharmāḥ yatra tat dīpakam viduḥ
yat ca itas hāri sādharmyam upamāna upameyayoḥ
mithas vibhinna kāla ādi śabdayoḥ upamā tu tat
yathā iva śabda yogena sā śrutyā anvayam arhati
sadṛśa ādi pada āśleṣāt anyathā iti uditā dvidhā
saṃkṣepa abhihitā api eṣā
sāmya upameya tad vāci viyogāt ca nibadhyate
kvacid samāse tad vāci viraheṇa kvacid ca sā
tathā upamānāt ācārakyac pratyaya bala uktitaḥ

original: kvacitsā karturācāre kyaṅā sā ca kvipā kvacit // UKss_1.19 //
analyzed: kvacid sā kartuḥ ācāre kyaṅā sā ca kvipā kvacid

original: upamāne karmaṇi vā kartari vā yo ṇamulkaṣādagataḥ /
analyzed: upamāne karmaṇi vā kartari vā yaḥ ṇamul kaṣāda gataḥ

original: tadvācyā sā vatinā ca karma sāmānyavacanena // UKss_1.20 //
analyzed: tad vācyā sā vatinā ca karma sāmānya vacanena
ṣaṣṭhī saptamī antāt ca yaḥ vatiḥ nāmataḥ tad abhidhaye

original: kalpatprabhṛtibhiranyaiśca taddhitaiḥ sā nibadhyate kavibhiḥ // UKss_1.21 //
analyzed: kalpat prabhṛtibhiḥ anyaiḥ ca tad hitaiḥ sā nibadhyate kavibhiḥ
upamāna saṃnidhāne sāmya vācī ucyate budhaiḥ yatra

original: upameyasya ca kavibhiḥ sā prativastūpamā gaditā // UKss_1.22 //
analyzed: upameyasya ca kavibhiḥ sā prativastūpamā gaditā
prākaraṇika itara tva sthityā ekaḥ ca upameya tām labhate
upamāna tvam ca apare iti upamā vāci śūnyatvam
ākṣepa ūrthāntaranyāsaḥ vyatirekaḥ vibhāvanā
samāsa atiśayoktī ca iti alaṅkārān pare viduḥ
pratiṣedhaḥ iva iṣṭasya yaḥ viśeṣa abhidhitsayā

original: ākṣepa iti taṃ santaḥ śaṃsanti kavayaḥ sadā // UKss_2.2 //
analyzed: ākṣepaḥ iti tam santaḥ śaṃsanti kavayaḥ sadā
vakṣyamāṇa ukta viṣayaḥ sa ca dvividhaḥ iṣyate

original: niṣedheneva tadbandho vidheyasya ca kīrtitaḥ // UKss_2.3 //
analyzed: niṣedhena iva tad bandhaḥ vidheyasya ca kīrtitaḥ
samarthakasya pūrvam yat vacaḥ nyasya ca pṛṣṭhatas
viparyayeṇa vā yat syāt hi śabda uktyā anyathā api vā
jñeyaḥ saḥ ūrtha antara nayāsaḥ prakṛta artha samarthanāt
aprastuta para śaṃsāyāḥ dṛṣṭāntāt ca pṛthak sthitaḥ
viśeṣa upādānam yat syāt upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: nimittādṛṣṭidṛṣṭibhyāṃ vyatireko dvidhī tu saḥ // UKss_2.6 //
analyzed: nimitta adṛṣṭi dṛṣṭibhyām vyatirekaḥ dvidhī tu saḥ
yaḥ vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā iva ādi samanvitaḥ
vyatirekaḥ tra saḥ pi īṣṭaḥ viśeṣa āpādana anvayāt
śliṣṭa ukti yogya śabdasya pṛthak pṛthak udāhṛtau

original: viśeṣāpādanaṃ yatsyādyvatarekaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // UKss_2.8 //
analyzed: viśeṣa āpādanam yat syāt yvatarekaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ
kriyāyāḥ pratiṣedhe yā tad phalasya vibhāvanā

original: jñeyā vibhāvanaivāsau samādhau sulabhe sati // UKss_2.9 //
analyzed: jñeyā vibhāvanā eva asau samādhau sulabhe sati
prakṛta arthena vākyena tad samānaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ
aprastuta artha kathanam samāsoktiḥ udāhṛtā
nimittataḥ yat tu vayaḥ loka atikrānta gocaram
manyante tām alaṃkāra tayā budhāḥ
bhede na anya tvam anyatra nānātvam yatra badhyate
tathā saṃbhāvyamāna artha nibandhe tiśayokti gīḥ
kārya kāraṇayoḥ yatra paurvāparya viparyayāt

original: āśubhāvaṃ samālambya badhyate so 'pi pūrvavat // UKss_2.13 //
analyzed: āśu bhāvam samālambya badhyate saḥ u pi pūrvavat
yathāsaṃkhyam atha utprekṣām svabhāvoktim tathā eva ca
apare trīn alaṅkārān girām āhuḥ alaṅkṛtau
bhūyasām upadiṣṭānām arthāḥ nāma sadharmaṇām
kramaśas yaḥ nu nirdeśaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam tat ucyate
sāmya rūpa avivakṣāyām vācya iva ādi ātmabhiḥ padaiḥ
a tad guṇa kriyā yogāt utprekṣā atiśaya anvitā
loka atikrānta viṣayāḥ bhāva abhāva abhimānataḥ
saṃbhāvanā iyam utprekṣā vācyā iva ādibhiḥ ucyate
kriyāyām saṃpravṛttasya hevākānām nibandhanam
kasyacid mṛga ḍimbha ādeḥ svabhāva uktiḥ udāhṛtā
preyaḥ rasavat ūrjasava paryāya uktam samāhitam
dvidhā udāttam tathā śliṣṭam alaṅkārān pare viduḥ
rati ādikānām bhāvānām anubhāva ādi sūcanaiḥ
yat kāvyam badhyate sadbhiḥ tat preyasvat udāhṛtam
rasavat darśita spaṣṭa śṛṅgāra ādi rasāt ayam
śṛṅgāra hāsya karaṇa raudra vīra bhayānakāḥ

original: bībhatsādbhutaśāntāśca nava nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ // UKss_4.4 //
analyzed: bībhatsa adbhuta śāntāḥ ca nava nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ
anaucitya pravṛttānām kāma krodha ādi kāraṇāt

original: bhāvānāṃ ca rasānāṃ ca bandha ūrjasvi kathyate // UKss_4.5 //
analyzed: bhāvānām ca rasānām ca bandhaḥ ūrjasvi kathyate
paryāya uktam yat anyena prakāreṇa abhidhīyate
vācya vācaka vṛttibhyām śūnyena avagama ātmanā
anya anubhāva niḥśūnya rūpam yat tat samāhitam
udāttam ṛddhimat vastu caritam ca mahātmanām
upalakṣaṇa tām prāptam na iti vṛtta tvam āgatam
eka prayatna uccāryāṇām tad chāyām ca eva bibhratām
svarita ādi guṇaiḥ bhinnaiḥ bandhaḥ śliṣṭam iha ucyate
alaṅkāra antara gatām pratibhām janayat padaiḥ
dvividhaiḥ artha śabda ukti viśiṣṭam tat pratīyatām
apahnutim viśeṣa uktim virodham tulyayogitām
aprastuta praśaṃsā ca vyāja stuti vidarśane
upameya upamām ca eva sahoktim saṃkaram tathā
parivṛttim ca jagaduḥ alaṅkārān pare girām
apahnutiḥ abhīṣṭā ca kiñcid antargatā upamā
bhūta artha apahnavena asyāḥ nibandhaḥ kriyate budhaiḥ
yat sāmagrye pi śaktīnām phala anutpatti bandhanam
viśeṣasya abhidhitsātaḥ tat vaśeṣa uktiḥ ucyate
darśitena nimittena nimitta adarśanena ca

original: tasyā bandho dvidhā lakṣye dṛśyate lalitātmakaḥ // UKss_5.5 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ bandhaḥ dvidhā lakṣye dṛśyate lalitā ātmakaḥ
guṇasya vā kriyāyāḥ vā viruddha anya kriyā vacaḥ
yat viśeṣa abhidhānāya virodham tam pracakṣate
upamāna upameya ukti śūnyaiḥ aprastutaiḥ vacaḥ
sāmya abhidhāyi prastāva bhāgbhiḥ vā tulya yogi tā
adhikārāt apetasya vastunaḥ nyasya yā stutiḥ
aprastuta praśaṃsā iyam prastuta artha anubandhinī
śabda śakti svabhāvena yatra nindā iva gamyate
vastutas tu stutiḥ ca iṣṭā vyāja stutiḥ asau matā
abhavān vastu saṃbandhaḥ bhavan vā yatra kalpayet
upamāna upameya tvam kathyate sā vidarśanā
aneka alaṅkriyā ullekhe samam tad vṛtti asaṃbhave

original: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṃkaraḥ // UKss_5.11 //
analyzed: ekasya ca grahe nyāya doṣa abhāve ca saṃkaraḥ
śabda artha varti alaṅkārāḥ vākye ekatra bhāsinaḥ
saṃkaraḥ vai eka vākya aṃśa praveśāt vā abhidhīyate
paraspara upakāreṇa yatra alaṅkṛtayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: svātantryeṇātmalābhaṃ no labhante so 'pi saṃkaraḥ // UKss_5.13 //
analyzed: svātantryeṇa ātma lābham no labhante saḥ pi saṃkaraḥ
anyonyam eva yatra syāt upamāna upameya tā
upameya upamām āhuḥ tām pakṣa antara hāni gām
tulya kāle kriye yatra vastu dvaya samāśrite

original: padenaikena kathyete sā sahoktirmatā satām // UKss_5.15 //
analyzed: padena ekena kathyete sā sahoktiḥ matā satām
sama nyūna viśeṣṭaiḥ tu kasyacid parivartanam
artha anartha svabhāvam yat parivṛttiḥ abhāṇi sā
ananvayam sa saṃdeham saṃsṛṣṭim bhāvikam tathā
kāvya dṛṣṭānta hetū ca iti alaṅkārān pare viduḥ

original: upamānena tattvaṃ ca bhedaṃ ca vadataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: upamānena tattvam ca bhedam ca vadataḥ punar

original: sasaṃdehaṃ vacaḥ stutyai sasaṃdehaṃ vadurbudhāḥ // UKss_6.2 //
analyzed: sa saṃdeham vacaḥ stutyai sa saṃdeham vaduḥ budhāḥ
alaṅkāra antara chāyām yat kṛtvā dhīṣu bandhanam
asaṃdehe saṃdeha rūpam saṃdeha nāma tat
yatra tanā eva tasya syāt upamāna upameya tā
a sādṛśya vivakṣātaḥ tam iti āhuḥ ananvayam
alaṅkṛtīnām bahvīnām dvayoḥ vā api samāśrayaḥ
ekatra nirapekṣāṇām mithas saṃsṛṣṭiḥ ucyate
pratyakṣāḥ iva yatra arthāḥ dṛśyante bhūta bhāvinaḥ
ati adbhutāḥ syāt tat vācām an ākulyena bhāvikam
śrutam ekam yat anyatra smṛteḥ anubhavasya vā
hetutām pratipadye kāvya liṅgam tat ucyate
iṣṭasya arthasya vispaṣṭa pratibimba nidarśanam
yathevādi padaiḥ sūnyam budhaiḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate
